articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Naveen-ul-haq reacts on Asia Cup snub as left fans upset over no Kohli contest - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Naveen's absence became the cynosure of the squad announcement on social media with fans expressing their disappointment at missing a long-awaited Kohli contest | Cricket
articles.content: Afghanistan on Sunday named their 17-member squad for the 2023 edition of the Asia Cup, which begins from August 30 onwards with the event being played in Pakistan and Sri Lanka. The side has made as… [+3026 chars]
